SELECT T1."time", IDC.NAME "channelName", IDC.CODE "channelCode", IDC.PROMOTION_URL "channelUrl", T1."pv", T1."uv", T1."vv", CASE WHEN T1."vv" = 0 THEN 0 ELSE T1."totalJump" / T1."vv" END "jumpRate", CASE WHEN T1."uv" = 0 THEN 0 ELSE T1."pv" / T1."uv" END "avrPages", CASE WHEN T1."vv" = 0 THEN 0 ELSE T1."pv" / T1."vv" END "avrDeeps", CASE WHEN T1."vv" = 0 THEN 0 ELSE T1."stayTime" / T1."vv" END "avrTimes", T2."ruv", T3."rsNum", T2."ruv" / T1."uv" "rRate", T3."rsNum" / T2."ruv" "rsRate", T4."orderNum" "orderNum", T4."orderAmount" "orderAmount", T4."orderNum" / T1."uv" "orderTrans", T5."orderNum" "paidOrderNum", T5."orderNum" / T4."orderNum" "payRate", T5."orderAmount" "paidOrderAmount"， T4."orderAmount" / T4."orderNum" "avgAmount" FROM ( SELECT IDWC.TIME "time", IDWC.CHANNEL_ID "channelId", IDWC.PV "pv", IDWC.UV "uv", IDWC.VV "vv", IDWC.STAY_TIME / 1000 "stayTime", IDWC.TOTAL_JUMP "totalJump" FROM IUNI_DA_WEBKPI_CHANNEL IDWC
IDWC.TTYPE = 'dd'
AND IDWC.TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
AND IDWC.TIME < TO_DATE(#{endDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') + 1
) T1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IDWP.TIME "time", IDWP.CHANNEL_ID "channelId", SUM(IDWP.UV) "ruv" FROM IUNI_DA_WEBKPI_PAGE IDWP
IDWP.PAGE LIKE '%register%' AND IDWP.TTYPE = 'dd'
AND IDWP.TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
AND IDWP.TIME < TO_DATE(#{endDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') + 1
GROUP BY IDWP.TIME, IDWP.CHANNEL_ID ) T2 ON T1."time" = T2."time" AND T1."channelId" = T2."channelId" LEFT JOIN IUNI_DA_CHANNEL IDC ON T1."channelId" = IDC.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(IU.REGISTER_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') "time", IU.IUNI_AD_ID "adId", COUNT(1) "rsNum" FROM IUNI_USER IU
AND IU.REGISTER_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
AND IU.REGISTER_TIME < TO_DATE(#{endDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') + 1
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(IU.REGISTER_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), IU.IUNI_AD_ID ) T3 ON T3."time" = T1."time" AND T3."adId" = IDC.CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME), 'YYYY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') "time", TO_CHAR(IOI.FROM_AD) "adId", COUNT(1) "orderNum", SUM(IOI.ORDER_AMOUNT) "orderAmount" FROM IUNI_ORDER_INFO IOI
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) >= TO_DATE(#{startDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) < TO_DATE(#{endDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') + 1
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME), 'YYYY/MM/DD'), IOI.FROM_AD ) T4 ON T4."time" = T1."time" AND T4."adId" = IDC.CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME), 'YYYY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') "time", TO_CHAR(IOI.FROM_AD) "adId", COUNT(1) "orderNum", SUM(IOI.ORDER_AMOUNT) "orderAmount" FROM IUNI_ORDER_INFO IOI
IOI.PAY_STATUS = 'paid'
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) >= TO_DATE(#{startDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) < TO_DATE(#{endDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') + 1
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME), 'YYYY/MM/DD'), IOI.FROM_AD ) T5 ON T5."time" = T1."time" AND T5."adId" = IDC.CODE
IDC.STATUS = 1 AND IDC.CANCEL_FLAG = 0
AND IDC.CODE LIKE '%' || #{channelCode} || '%'
AND IDC.TYPE_ID = #{channelTypeId}
ORDER BY T1."time", T1."channelId"

SELECT IDC.NAME "name", COUNT(1) "value" FROM IUNI_ORDER_INFO IOI LEFT JOIN IUNI_DA_CHANNEL IDC ON TO_CHAR(IOI.FROM_AD) = IDC.CODE
IDC.STATUS = 1 AND IDC.CANCEL_FLAG = 0
AND IDC.CODE LIKE '%' || #{channelCode} || '%'
AND IDC.TYPE_ID = #{channelTypeId}
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) >= TO_DATE(#{startDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) < TO_DATE(#{endDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') + 1
GROUP BY IDC.NAME

SELECT IDC.NAME "name", COUNT(1) "value" FROM IUNI_ORDER_INFO IOI LEFT JOIN IUNI_DA_CHANNEL IDC ON TO_CHAR(IOI.FROM_AD) = IDC.CODE WHERE 1 = 1 AND IDC.STATUS = 1 AND IDC.CANCEL_FLAG = 0
AND IDC.CODE LIKE '%' || #{channelCode} || '%'
AND IDC.TYPE_ID = #{channelTypeId}
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.PAY_TIME) >= TO_DATE(#{startDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.PAY_TIME) < TO_DATE(#{endDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') + 1
GROUP BY IDC.NAME

SELECT IDC.NAME "name", SUM(IDW.PV) "value" FROM IUNI_DA_WEBKPI IDW LEFT JOIN IUNI_DA_CHANNEL IDC ON IDW.CHANNEL_ID = IDC.ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND IDC.STATUS = 1 AND IDC.CANCEL_FLAG = 0
AND IDC.CODE LIKE '%' || #{channelCode} || '%'
AND IDC.TYPE_ID = #{channelTypeId}
AND IDW.TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
AND IDW.TIME < TO_DATE(#{endDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') + 1
GROUP BY IDC.NAME

SELECT IDC.NAME "name", SUM(IDW.UV) "value" FROM IUNI_DA_WEBKPI IDW LEFT JOIN IUNI_DA_CHANNEL IDC ON IDW.CHANNEL_ID = IDC.ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND IDC.STATUS = 1 AND IDC.CANCEL_FLAG = 0
AND IDC.CODE LIKE '%' || #{channelCode} || '%'
AND IDC.TYPE_ID = #{channelTypeId}
AND IDW.TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
AND IDW.TIME < TO_DATE(#{endDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') + 1
GROUP BY IDC.NAME

SELECT IDC.NAME "name", SUM(IDW.VV) "value" FROM IUNI_DA_WEBKPI IDW LEFT JOIN IUNI_DA_CHANNEL IDC ON IDW.CHANNEL_ID = IDC.ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND IDC.STATUS = 1 AND IDC.CANCEL_FLAG = 0
AND IDC.CODE LIKE '%' || #{channelCode} || '%'
AND IDC.TYPE_ID = #{channelTypeId}
AND IDW.TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
AND IDW.TIME < TO_DATE(#{endDateStr}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') + 1
GROUP BY IDC.NAME
